body_text: Why is everyone affected by Infinite Tsukuyomi? As we know, we can avoid Sharingan-based genjutsu just by avoiding eye contact. Can't we avoid Infinite Tsukuyomi just by not looking at the moon?
Does the Infinite Tsukyomi work only on the living? Why does the Infinite Tsukuyomi work only on the living? (As the Edo Tensei Hokages were not affected by it)
